segments.text: I want to see the man responsible for selling typewriters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Steven . I'm the Sales Manager of this company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , look here . Ten new typewriters were delivered to my company yesterday afternoon and only five of them work properly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Never mind being sorry , what are you going to do about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry , we'll soon fix them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , I hope you'll make sure that it won't happen again .
segments.speaker: S1
